product_description.Ice Ice Baby: You have guests coming over for a party and you realize that there is no ice at home. Don't panic, with the 1-hour Icing technology you can put your worries on ice. By bringing the freezer temperature down to -5ºC in 60 minutes, ice is made much quicker and your favorite drinks that much more cooler.
product_description.Crisp and Fresher Veggies: Who doesn't want fresh crispy veggies in their fridges? Thanks to the vegetable crisper drawer in this refrigerator, freshness is guaranteed. Store more for longer in the large crisper and avoid having to make multiple trips to the grocery store.

review:
The fridge looks good. Works great so far. No complaints as yet. Fit and finish looks decent but not super premium. Haier was very prompt with the installation/demo. So all in all a good shopping experince.

The fridge works well too. Very deep and spacious inside. I like the idea of the chiller tray being below. Makes a lot of sense. Unless your chiller is cooling the rest of the fridge... I'm not sure why you'll want it anywhere else.

Fabulous product from Haier. Good design, good cooling. But as mentioned in the description, there is no coolpad. Haier technician said coolpad option not available for this model. Technician charged rupees 400/ (with invoice) extra for fitting two germ filter inside the fridge, which is optional. Overall experience good.
It's good, perfect for my family..... on time delivered and perfect match. Good support from the installation team.

superb product by haier !
Quick cooling with nice white LED on top !
No noise !
Spacious !
And formost I need not to bend !
I love the product all together !
Installation is also quick !
Haier is the brand you can trust.

It's a great product at its best price. Got it for 22,000 and replaced my old fridge. The concept of freezer being at the bottom is the best feature for a fridge. Otherwise as well the compartments are spacious and deep. Highly recommended I am reviewing this after a month of purchase

Everytime I open my fridge door, I fall in love with it, yet again. The inside space, the shelf life never imagined so. Veg that rotted in 3 days in earlier fridge stayed fresh in this for 3 weeks! No more words! However, Haier agents showed up after 10 days for installation. Did not matter though. Installation was easy; my hubby had just plugged it into the power socket and 2 hours later it was ready for use!

The freezer being at the bottom is a key feature and is actually rather user friendly. The Compressor is exposed at the back and clear instructions to keep space (6 inches) on back and sides to have air circulation. There is a vertical plate towards the back of the shelves and the cold air circulation starts from the top (the top shelf is the coldest). So items should be suitably placed with the the lowest shelf having items which do not require too much of refrigration. The Vegetable tray is deep and comes out like a drawer.
Similarly, the freezer at the bottom also has a deep tray which slides out.

The only issue I had was when my daughter dropped a large bottle of coke on the side tray (on the door) while lifting it up and the tray cracked on the impact. I strengthened the cracked tray base with several layers of transparent scotch tape to make it better that the original state (resistant to such shock impacts)

I ordered Haier's 320L Frost Free refrigerator on October 22 and got the delivery on October 24. I would first like to show a gratitude of appreciation to the flipkart for the on-time delivery of the item, and also for offering me an excellent cashback on Citibank Card. Haier sent out a demo and installation team on October 26. I was impressed by the Haier team's customer centricity, by going great lengths in highlighting the impressive features of the product. I was given an overview of the product's functionalities, with special focus on the Frost free functionality of the refrigerator that I was interested in. I and my family were fully satisfied with the product's capabilities, and was excited to use it. Haier also presented my family a gift, which incidently was one of the things I was looking out for. A big shout out to Haier's ingenuous design to have the vegetable tray on the top door, and incorporating an adjustable tray in terms of height. I was also impressed by the cooling pad, and the easy handling of ice cubes. One of the minor observations that I found out after 5 days of usage is the heating of the side panel, which could be looked into by the Haier design team. Also I felt that the gloss on the side panels paled in comparison with the front door panel. But in overall terms, with respect to form and functionality, this product is way beyond my expectations, and my choice of choosing this brand over others, was ultimately one of the best decisions that I have taken. Thank you Haier and Flipkart !!
